videodesc.scalemode: How the game view should be scaled to match the window size
videodesc.border: What image to fill the black regions around the game view on odd window sizes with
videodesc.outlines:
Toggles the 3D outline effect and shadow clipping

Disabling may improve performance on lower-end hardware
videodesc.aa: If the game view should be anti-aliased on non-integer resolutions

audiodesc.unfocusedmute: Mutes all game audio if the game window isn't focused
audiodesc.musicattenuation: Mutes the games music if any media is being played through a Windows Media Control compatible application.
audiodesc.attenuationwait: How much time is needed of there being no played media for the music to get unmuted

accessdesc.colouredscore: If each character on the score counter should be individually coloured

savedelete.name: Delete Save Data
savedelete.question:
Are you sure you want
to delete all save data?

closegame.name: Close Game
closegame.question:
Are you sure you want
to close the game?

title.exitquestion: Are you sure you want to close the game?
title.outdated:
You are playing an outdated version!
Please update to the latest version by going {H:{0}}here{/}.

text:
"Onesie-Wearing Man-Child"
The star of the show!

"A Compassionate Party Host"
The Noise's sweet love!

Halloween is here, and Noisette is 
hosting a Halloween party! 
Unfortunately, there aren't enough 
pumpkins to sell the spooky vibes.
The Noise, being the "ever so reliable" 
doughnut that he is, sets out to 
fulfill Noisette's party needs.

Collect Pumpkins! 
You need 5 Pumpkins to 
finish the level 
Grab 5 more to get 
a Perfect Ranking!

Destroy Crates! 
A variety of these Crates contribute 
to your final score!

Don't die! 
You'll lose small progress and 
a few bonuses if you do

Get to the end! 
Both paths will lead to it

Punch by pressing the 
Attack key on ground!

Kick by pressing the 
Attack key in mid-air! 
This gives you brief airtime

Slide by pressing the 
Down key while moving!

Tornado Spin by pressing the 
Attack key while Sprinting!

Head-Slam by pressing 
the Down key in mid-air!

Hover by holding the 
Jump key in mid-air!

Wall Slide by touching 
a wall in mid-air!

Wall Jump by Jumping during 
a Wall Slide!
Somersault by Jumping during a turn!

Moves around aimlessly 
A wanderer at best

Stands in place and 
spits Fly Plasma if 
The Noise gets too close

Follows The Noise and 
shoots Witch Brewery 
if he tries escaping

Gets aggravated and 
chases The Noise 
when he collects 
a nearby Pumpkin

Flies in place 
and hurts The Noise 
from its underside 
(respawns after awhile)

Flies in place and 
exhales fire at 
consistent intervals 
(respawns after awhile)

Gives 1 candy 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Gives a random amount 
of candy 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Breaks in 5 bounces 
Head-Slamming or breaking it 
from the side does not give 
candy 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Cannot be destroyed 
by a bounce 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Starts a 3 second explosion 
timer on bounce 
Explodes on side damage 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Explodes on contact 
Find the Nitro Detonator to 
set them off 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Gives The Noise up 
to 2 extra hit points 
(Adds to Crate Score)

A respawn spot for 
when The Noise dies 
(DOES NOT add 
to Crate Score)

Explodes but does not hurt 
The Noise 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Ignites fire from all sides at 
consistent intervals 
Its flames burn The Noise 
(Adds to Crate Score)

Turns into a Nitro Crate 
after 3 bounces 
(Adds to Crate Score)
Switches Happy and Sad Crates

When Happy, The Noise cannot 
pass through 
When Sad, The Noise can 
pass through

Find these outhouses to unlock Fast Travel!
The flag warns you that until you hit
a checkpoint, important collectibles
will not save on death.

Get to the Death Platform
without dying to access the Death Route!

An arduous trial awaits you,
along with its valuable treasure...

By grabbing many collectibles
in succession, they'll turn gold,
and become more valuable!

Jumping after Crouching
gives The Noise a higher jump!

Jumping after Head-Slamming 
the ground also gives 
The Noise a higher jump!

Attacking during a Slide boosts 
The Noise at incredible speeds!

Attacking after Head-Slamming into 
the ground makes The Noise Slide!
